title: How does one get Google to honor their warranty
content:
My charge port wasn't working well. I did all the troubleshooting steps and then took it to YouBreakIFix. They told me they could see no damage and, since it was under warranty, I should call Google.
HUGE MISTAKE
I have now spent over 5 hours on the phone, a few more in text conversations, all over a week - only to still be told the same thing, again and again and again. 
Due to 'technical difficulties', they cannot process my claim, but they will check on it and get back to me. 
My warranty rubs out in November. If I didnt know better, I would thnk they were just trying to run out the clock.
Anyone have any luck speaking with anyone there that can get them to honor their warranty?
